014package org.jdbi.v3.core.statement;
015
016import java.sql.CallableStatement;
017import java.sql.Connection;
018import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
019import java.sql.ResultSet;
020import java.sql.SQLException;
021import java.sql.Statement;
022
023/**
024 * A StatementBuilder which will always create a new PreparedStatement.
025 */
026public class DefaultStatementBuilder implements StatementBuilder {
027    public static final StatementBuilderFactory FACTORY = c -> new DefaultStatementBuilder();
028
029    public DefaultStatementBuilder() {}
030
031    @Override
032    public Statement create(Connection conn, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
033        return conn.createStatement();
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Create a new DefaultStatementBuilder which will always create a new PreparedStatement from
038     * the Connection
039     *
040     * @param conn Used to prepare the statement
041     * @param sql  Translated SQL statement
042     * @param ctx  Unused
043     *
044     * @return a new PreparedStatement
045     */
046    @Override
047    public PreparedStatement create(Connection conn, String sql, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
048        if (ctx.isReturningGeneratedKeys()) {
049            String[] columnNames = ctx.getGeneratedKeysColumnNames();
050            if (columnNames != null && columnNames.length > 0) {
051                return conn.prepareStatement(sql, columnNames);
052            }
053            return conn.prepareStatement(sql, Statement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS);
054        } else if (ctx.isConcurrentUpdatable()) {
055            return conn.prepareStatement(sql, ResultSet.TYPE_FORWARD_ONLY, ResultSet.CONCUR_UPDATABLE);
056        } else {
057            return conn.prepareStatement(sql, ResultSet.TYPE_FORWARD_ONLY, ResultSet.CONCUR_READ_ONLY);
058        }
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Called to close an individual prepared statement created from this builder.
063     * In this case, it closes immediately.
064     *
065     * @param sql  the translated SQL which was prepared
066     * @param stmt the statement
067     *
068     * @throws java.sql.SQLException if anything goes wrong closing the statement
069     */
070    @Override
071    public void close(Connection conn, String sql, Statement stmt) throws SQLException {
072        if (stmt != null) {
073            stmt.close();
074        }
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * No need to do anything on connection close.
079     */
080    @Override
081    public void close(Connection conn) {}
082
083    /**
084     * Called each time a Callable statement needs to be created
085     *
086     * @param conn the JDBC Connection the statement is being created for
087     * @param sql the translated SQL which should be prepared
088     * @param ctx Statement context associated with the SqlStatement this is building for
089     */
090    @Override
091    public CallableStatement createCall(Connection conn, String sql, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
092        return conn.prepareCall(sql);
093    }
094}
